attributes.action: order travel companies to give 14 day minimum period of notice of cancellation of holidays to destinations to which the FCO advise against travel
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Due to political unrest commencing on 3 January 2008 in the previously popular tourist destination of Kenya, the majority of travel companies have cancelled holidays to Kenya but ONLY at 48 - 72 hours notice.  This is not an acceptable way to treat consumers who require to make arrangements to travel to departue airports, take leave from work, take travel vaccinations and medication and arrange an alterntive holiday.  In a situation such as this, when the Foreign & Commonwealth Office advise against travel, holidays departing in next 14 days should be cancelled to give consumers fair notice.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
